reqs.title: Slack run bootstrap pipeline
acceptance: Slash command verified with Slack signing secret before execution
Run row persisted with open status pickup metadata correlation ID
Interactive message posted within 2s showing controls
Optional parameters validated and reflected in Slack response
Kafka run_created event emitted with run identifiers

reqs.title: Order capture and preference reuse
acceptance: Order modal enforces length and non-empty validation
Order upsert updates participant count in channel message
Use last order pulls preference or errors gracefully
Order edits or cancels prevent duplicate active orders
Confirmed orders refresh channel-scoped preference record

reqs.title: Run close fairness and summary
acceptance: Close action restricted to initiator or admins with clear errors
Fairness picks runner via runs_served_count then last_run_at
Run transitions to closed with runner stats updated transactionally
Channel summary lists metadata runner and participant orders
Runner DM mirrors summary plus totals and reminder info

reqs.title: Reminder scheduling and delivery
acceptance: Runs with pickup time enqueue reminder payloads on Kafka
Runner reminders sent at pickup time minus offset within tolerance
Optional last call channel alerts respect channel settings
Reminder outcomes logged and emitted as metrics
Failed reminders retried with backoff and surfaced in errors

reqs.title: Admin channel controls and resets
acceptance: Admin command verifies Slack roles or configured admins
Config UI updates reminder offset fairness window retention bounds
Config changes persist and emit audit entries
Disabled channels reject new runs with clear notice
Data reset purges channel history and logs action summary

reqs.title: Postgres schema and retention policies
acceptance: Migrations create tables for users channels runs orders preferences stats audits
Retention columns default to 90 days and accept overrides
ORM models expose shared serialization helpers
Vault-sourced DB credentials power resilient session factory
Migration command documented and idempotent for CI

reqs.title: Kafka topics and reminder worker plumbing
acceptance: Kafka topics defined with partitions replication and retention notes
Producer consumer utilities enforce payload schemas and IDs
Reminder worker harness documented with graceful shutdown
Topic ACL needs captured for platform coordination
Kafka connectivity metrics exported for Prometheus
